name: Tumblr - Brittana icon set
description: Replace your Tumblr icons with a songbird (for Santana's song to Brittany), a unicorn, a heart, a cheer megaphone, and a daisy (for innocence and loyal love)! (Updated 02/13 to work with Tumblr's format changes.)

user.name: GeekintheJeep
user.about:
A 24-year old geek who happens to have inadvertently stumbled into this Tumblr editing stuff.

Contact me here or on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any questions or requests!

additional_info: Contact me on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any questions/problems/requests. The Brittana logo shown in the second picture was also made by me, and can be found here - [x] Edited 12/09/14: Updated to work with Tumblr's new format change. Please note that the cheer megaphone will only appear if you are using XKit.
